verbs.description: [V: have] train riders found a sneaky new way to cheat on nj transit fares a new type of fare - beater is becoming a money - sapping problem for nj transit using a half - price ticket to which they 're not entitled claims the head of a conductor union new jersey transit train lisa torbic stephen j burkert
